Rule: SEGMENT_ID : unique identifier, twelve-digit code, based on segment ID positions and attribute codes, do not drop leading zeroes
BHC_NAME : bank holding company name, text
RSSD_ID : RSSD ID number, numeric
REPORTING_MONTH : reporting month, date, format MM/YYYY
PORTFOLIO_ID : portfolio ID, fixed value "Auto"
PRODUCT_TYPE : product type segment, fixed values "01", "02", "03"
AGE : age segment, fixed values "01", "02", "03", "04", "05", "06"
ORIGINAL_LTV : original LTV segment, fixed values "01", "02", "03", "04"
ORIGINAL_CREDIT_SCORE : original industry standard credit score or equivalent segment, fixed values "01", "02", "03", "04", "05", "06"
GEOGRAPHY : geography segment, fixed values "01", "02", "03", "04", "05", "06"
DELINQUENCY_STATUS : delinquency status segment, fixed values "01", "02", "03", "04", "05"
Product type : categorical, values=01,02,03, fixed values
Age : categorical, values=01,02,03,04,05,06, fixed values
Original LTV : categorical, values=01,02,03,04, fixed values
Original commercially available credit bureau score : categorical, values=00,01,02,03,04,05, fixed values
Geography : categorical, values=01,02,03,04,05, fixed values
Region : fixed values: Vermont, New Hampshire, Nebraska, South Dakota, North Dakota
Delinquency status : fixed values: 01, 02, 03, 04, 05, description: current, 1-29 days past due, 30-59 days past due, 60-89 days past due, 90-119 days past due, 120 or more days past due
Accounts : non-negative integer
Outstandings : non-negative number
New accounts : non-negative integer
New accounts amount : non-negative number
Interest rate : non-negative number, percentage
Vehicle type car/van : non-negative number
Vehicle type SUV/truck : non-negative number
Vehicle type : categorical, values include Sport/Luxury/Convertible, Unknown
Repossession : non-negative numeric, cumulative
Current Month Repossession : non-negative numeric, monthly
Gross contractual charge-offs : non-negative numeric, monthly
Bankruptcy charge-offs : non-negative numeric, monthly
Recoveries : numeric, monthly, can be negative
Net charge-offs : numeric, monthly, calculated
Adjustment factor : numeric, can be zero, used for reconciliation
Ever 30DPD in the last 12 months : numeric, non-negative, past due amount
Ever 60DPD in the last 12 months : numeric, non-negative, past due amount
Projected value : numeric, non-negative, applicable only for leased vehicles
Actual sale proceeds : numeric, non-negative, applicable only for leased vehicles
Original term : categorical, values = <= 48 months, 49-60 months, 61-72 months, > 72 months
Origination channel : categorical, values = direct, indirect
Loss mitigation : numeric, non-negative, loss mitigation program status
Joint application : categorical, values = yes, no
Probability of Default (PD) : numeric, between 0 and 1, average probability of default
Loss Given Default (LGD) : numeric, between 0 and 1, average loss given default
ELGD : numeric, non-negative, applicable only to advanced approaches reporting banks, missing values reported as null, fixed values possible (e.g. 0.9 for 90% expected loss)
RWA : numeric, non-negative, applicable only to banks subject to advanced approaches rule, required for BHC or IHC or SLHC-owned loans only
Unpaid Principal Balance at Charge-off : numeric, non-negative, excludes interest and fees, reported at time of charge-off
Percent Loss Severity (3 month Lagged) : numeric, non-negative, percentage value, calculated based on total loss net of recoveries, excludes losses on loans charged-off in later months
Weighted Average Life of Loans : numeric, non-negative, rounded to nearest monthly term, reflects current position, new business activity, and behavioral assumptions such as prepayments or defaults
